Row.Text: +30% Production from being the Đại Việt's unique wonder.
Receive 5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each Urban Population of the Settlement when you construct a Fortification Constructible on Standard Speed.

[BLIST][LI]Receive [B]5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]for each [B] Urban Population [/B]of the Settlement when you construct a [B]Fortification[/B] Constructible on Standard Speed.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Thành Huế[/B].[/LIST]
